snippet.title: Button City Soccer Days - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description: Watch as the adorable characters of Button City play soccer in this gameplay trailer for Button City Soccer Days. In Button City Soccer Days, build your dream team, plan your day, bond with teammates, enjoy action-packed soccer, and win the tournament. Button City Soccer Days will be available on Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5, and Steam
